timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into status-logger-singleton
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into status-logger-singleton

timeline.bodyText: Do these now wind up going to stdout? GenesisCommand and DepositCommand are expected to be used interactively so we want to make sure these messages are visible to the user, not going off to a file by default.
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: Ah, right. I'll add them back to the STATUS_LOG output in the next PR
replies.author: CjHare
